title: Aria Air Fryers Teflon-Free 7 Qt. Premium Ceramic Air Fryer with Recipe Book, White (CFW-907)
description: Bake, fry, grill, reheat, roast, and toast your favorite meats, breakfasts, desserts, vegetables, and more faster than ever with the Aria 7 Qt. Premium Ceramic Air Fryer! It reaches 400° in seconds using the most powerful air frying technology to cook faster than a traditional convection or microwave oven without the need for extra oil or grease, reducing the fat in your food by up to 80%! Roast mouth-watering chicken wings, sauté sizzling vegetables, grill tender salmon, or bake rich desserts instantly to enjoy and share anytime in this stylish black air fryer. The extra-large size allows you to cook for your entire family. The ceramic dishwasher safe basket and crisping rack are PTFE-free, PFOA-free, and BPA-free for extra safety and durability that is easier to clean. The non-toxic, Teflon-free air fryer construction provides excellent heat conduction for even results and won't peel, flake, or release harmful fumes! The included accessory set includes a two-tier stainless steel rack that doubles your cooking area and allows for cooking different dishes at once. The set also comes with 4 flat stainless steel skewers that are perfect for vegetables and meats, as well as a solid baking pan that is ideal for cakes, omelets, cookies, quiches, brownies, and more! The extended full-color cookbook has exclusive mouth-watering recipes curated by the champions of ABC's Family Food Fight so you can get started right away! It also features your favorite recipes including vegan and keto options from TV chef Mario Fabbri! Finally, enjoy all your meals in comfort knowing that Aria products have a lifetime warranty and friendly customer service. Endless culinary adventures await with the Aria 7 Qt. Air Fryer Oven!
features: CERAMIC AIR FRYER: All-in-1 appliance replaces your toaster, convection oven, microwave, deep fryer, and more while reducing fat in your food by up to 80% and eliminating the need for oil INSTANT PRE-HEAT: Reaches 400° in seconds using the most powerful air frying technology to cook faster than a traditional convection or microwave oven NON-TOXIC DESIGN: Ceramic dishwasher safe basket and crisping rack are PTFE-free, PFOA-free, and BPA-free for extra safety, and the non-toxic air fryer construction provides excellent heat conduction INCLUDED COOKBOOK: Extended full-color cookbook has exclusive mouth-watering recipes curated by the champions of ABC's Family Food Fight so you can get started right away 7 QT. CAPACITY: Extra-large size allows you to cook for your entire family, and the included accessory set includes a two-tier stainless steel rack that doubles your cooking area Included components: 1 baking pan for quiches, cookies, brownies, and desserts
